name: Ruins of Instability
description:
Delve into the mysterious ruins with your trusty suit of armor...

Controls: arrow keys or WASD.

Made for Ludum Dare 49

Using assets:

  • Cavernas by Adam Saltsman
  • 16x16 DungeonTileset II by 0x72
  • 2D Pixel Art Cat Sprites by Elthen's Pixel Art Shop
  • Free Pixel Font Bundle by Nimble Beasts Collective
  • Ninja Adventure - Asset Pack by pixel-boy
